ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Indian War in Space" written by Michael Uslan, penciled and inked by Romeo Tanghal."Eddie!""The Tunnels" written by Bill Kelley, penciled by Dick Ayers and inked by John Celardo. Notes:
Murray Boltinoff is credited for the story, "The Tunnels" as Bill Kelley.The letters page is turned over to Bob Rozakis, who writes a review of the book, For Want of a Nail By Robert Sobel, published by the Macmillan Company.
